mapper.sql: u.id, u.login_name as "loginName", u.user_type as "userType", u.salt, u.password, u.name, u.email, u.phone, u.mobile, u.login_ip as "loginIp", u.login_date as "loginDate", u.login_flag as "loginFlag", u.create_by as "createBy.id", u.create_date as "createDate", u.update_by as "updateBy.id", u.update_date as "updateDate", u.remarks
